verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> which was the <S%H6240>eighteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar.<s%>

Now at that time the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>'s <S%H2428>army<s%> was <S%H6696>besieging<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> was shut <S%H3607>up<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard,<s%> which was in the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

For <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> had shut him <S%H3607>up,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Why do you <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I will give this <S%H5892>city<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall take <S%H3920>it;<s%>

and <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall not <S%H4422>escape<s%> out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> but shall <S%H5414>surely<s%> be <S%H5414>delivered<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> with him <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes;<s%>

and he shall <S%H3212>bring<s%> <S%H6667>Zedekiah<s%> to <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall be there until I <S%H6485>visit<s%> <S%H5002>him,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> though you <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> you shall not <S%H6743>prosper?<s%>
<S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H2601>Behold,<s%> Hanamel the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum<s%> your <S%H1730>uncle<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, <S%H7069>Buy<s%> my <S%H7704>field<s%> that is in <S%H6068>Anathoth;<s%> for the <S%H4941>right<s%> of <S%H1353>redemption<s%> is yours to buy <S%H7069>it.<s%>

So <S%H2601>Hanamel<s%> my <S%H1730>uncle<s%>'s <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to me in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7069>me,<s%> Please buy my <S%H7704>field<s%> that is in <S%H6068>Anathoth,<s%> which is in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin;<s%> for the <S%H4941>right<s%> of <S%H3425>inheritance<s%> is <S%H1353>yours,<s%> and the redemption is <S%H7069>yours;<s%> buy it for <S%H3045>yourself.<s%> Then I knew that this was the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

I <S%H7069>bought<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> that was in <S%H6068>Anathoth<s%> of <S%H2601>Hanamel<s%> my <S%H1730>uncle<s%>'s <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H8254>weighed<s%> him the <S%H3701>money,<s%> even <S%H7651>seventeen<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>

I <S%H3789>subscribed<s%> the <S%H5612>deed,<s%> and <S%H2856>sealed<s%> <S%H5749>it,<s%> and called <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> and <S%H8254>weighed<s%> him the <S%H3701>money<s%> in the <S%H3976>balances.<s%>

So I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5612>deed<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase,<s%> both that which was <S%H2856>sealed,<s%> containing the <S%H4687>terms<s%> and <S%H2706>conditions,<s%> and that which was <S%H1540>open;<s%>

and I <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H5612>deed<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase<s%> to <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4271>Mahseiah,<s%> in the <S%H5869>presence<s%> of <S%H2601>Hanamel<s%> my <S%H1730>uncle<s%>'s <S%H5869>son,<s%> and in the presence of the <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> who <S%H3789>subscribed<s%> the <S%H5612>deed<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase,<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> all the <S%H3064>Jews<s%> who <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard.<s%>
I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> <S%H5869>before<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> saying,

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> these <S%H5612>deeds,<s%> this <S%H5612>deed<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase<s%> which is <S%H2856>sealed,<s%> and this <S%H5612>deed<s%> which is <S%H1540>open,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in an <S%H2789>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessel;<s%> that they may <S%H5975>continue<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H1004>Houses<s%> and <S%H7704>fields<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> shall yet <S%H7069>again<s%> be bought in this <S%H776>land.<s%>

Now <S%H310>after<s%> I had <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H5612>deed<s%> of the <S%H4736>purchase<s%> to <S%H1263>Baruch<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5374>Neriah,<s%> I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh!<s%> <S%H6213>Behold,<s%> you have made the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> by your <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and by your <S%H5186>outstretched<s%> <S%H2220>arm;<s%> there is <S%H1697>nothing<s%> too hard for <S%H6381>you,<s%>

who <S%H6213>show<s%> loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to <S%H505>thousands,<s%> and <S%H7999>recompense<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> into the <S%H2436>bosom<s%> of their <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1419>them;<s%> the great, the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is his <S%H8034>name;<s%>

<S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H6098>counsel,<s%> and <S%H7227>mighty<s%> in <S%H5950>work;<s%> whose <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are <S%H6491>open<s%> on all the <S%H1870>ways<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> according to his <S%H1870>ways,<s%> and according to the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of his <S%H4611>doings:<s%>

who <S%H7760>performed<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> and <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> even to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> both in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and among other <S%H120>men;<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> yourself a <S%H8034>name,<s%> as in this <S%H3117>day;<s%>

and brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> your <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H226>signs,<s%> and with <S%H4159>wonders,<s%> and with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and with an outstretched <S%H248>arm,<s%> and with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4172>terror;<s%>

and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them this <S%H776>land,<s%> which you <S%H7650>swore<s%> to their <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H776>them,<s%> a land <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey;<s%>

and they came <S%H935>in,<s%> and <S%H3423>possessed<s%> <S%H8085>it,<s%> but they didn't obey your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> neither <S%H1980>walked<s%> in your <S%H8451>law;<s%> they have <S%H6213>done<s%> nothing of all that you <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them to <S%H6213>do:<s%> therefore you have caused all this <S%H7451>evil<s%> to come on <S%H7122>them.<s%>

<S%H5550>Behold,<s%> the mounds, they have <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H3920>take<s%> <S%H5892>it;<s%> and the city is <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%> who <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H6440>it,<s%> because of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and of the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and of the <S%H1698>pestilence;<s%> and what you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> has <S%H7200>happened;<s%> and behold, you see it.

You have <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H136>me,<s%> Lord <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H7069>Buy<s%> the <S%H7704>field<s%> for <S%H3701>money,<s%> and <S%H5749>call<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses;<s%> whereas the <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%>
Then came the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>
<S%H3068>Behold,<s%> I am Yahweh, the <S%H430>God<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh:<s%> is there <S%H1697>anything<s%> too hard for <S%H6381>me?<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I will give this <S%H5892>city<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> and into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and he shall take <S%H3920>it:<s%>

and the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> who <S%H3898>fight<s%> against this <S%H5892>city,<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3341>set<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%> on <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> <S%H1004>it,<s%> with the houses, on whose <S%H1406>roofs<s%> they have offered <S%H6999>incense<s%> to <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> and poured <S%H5258>out<s%> drink <S%H5262>offerings<s%> to <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods,<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger.<s%>

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> only that which was <S%H7451>evil<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%> from their <S%H5271>youth;<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> have only provoked me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

For this <S%H5892>city<s%> has been to me a provocation of my <S%H639>anger<s%> and of my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that they <S%H1129>built<s%> it even to this <S%H3117>day;<s%> that I should <S%H5493>remove<s%> it from before my <S%H6440>face,<s%>

because of all the <S%H7451>evil<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> which they have <S%H6213>done<s%> to provoke me to <S%H3707>anger,<s%> <S%H4428>they,<s%> their kings, their <S%H8269>princes,<s%> their <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and their <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

They have <S%H6437>turned<s%> to me the <S%H6203>back,<s%> and not the <S%H6440>face:<s%> and though I <S%H3925>taught<s%> <S%H7925>them,<s%> rising up early and <S%H3925>teaching<s%> <S%H8085>them,<s%> yet they have not listened to <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction.<s%>
But they <S%H7760>set<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> which is <S%H7121>called<s%> by my <S%H8034>name,<s%> to defile <S%H2930>it.<s%>

They <S%H1129>built<s%> the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> which are in the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2011>Hinnom,<s%> to cause their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and their <S%H1323>daughters<s%> to <S%H5674>pass<s%> through fire to <S%H4432>Molech;<s%> which I <S%H6680>didn't<s%> command <S%H5927>them,<s%> neither did it come into my <S%H3820>mind,<s%> that they should <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H8441>abomination,<s%> to cause <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to <S%H2398>sin.<s%>

Now therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> concerning this <S%H5892>city,<s%> about which you <S%H559>say,<s%> It is <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and by the <S%H7458>famine,<s%> and by the <S%H1698>pestilence:<s%>

<S%H6908>Behold,<s%> I will gather them out of all the <S%H776>countries,<s%> where I have <S%H5080>driven<s%> them in my <S%H639>anger,<s%> and in my <S%H2534>wrath,<s%> and in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>indignation;<s%> and I will bring them <S%H7725>again<s%> to this <S%H4725>place,<s%> and I will cause them to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely:<s%>
and they shall be my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and I will be their <S%H430>God:<s%>

and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> that they may <S%H3372>fear<s%> me <S%H3117>forever,<s%> for their <S%H2896>good,<s%> and of their <S%H1121>children<s%> after <S%H310>them:<s%>

and I will <S%H3772>make<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H7725>them,<s%> that I will not turn away from following <S%H310>them,<s%> to do them <S%H3190>good;<s%> and I will <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H3374>fear<s%> in their <S%H3824>hearts,<s%> that they may not depart from <S%H5493>me.<s%>

<S%H7797>Yes,<s%> I will rejoice over them to do them <S%H2895>good,<s%> and I will <S%H5193>plant<s%> them in this <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H571>assuredly<s%> with my whole <S%H3820>heart<s%> and with my whole <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> Like as I have <S%H935>brought<s%> all this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> on this <S%H5971>people,<s%> so will I <S%H935>bring<s%> on them all the <S%H2896>good<s%> that I have promised <S%H1696>them.<s%>

<S%H7704>Fields<s%> shall be <S%H7069>bought<s%> in this <S%H776>land,<s%> about which you <S%H559>say,<s%> It is <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> without <S%H120>man<s%> or <S%H929>animal;<s%> it is <S%H5414>given<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%>

Men shall <S%H7069>buy<s%> <S%H7704>fields<s%> for <S%H3701>money,<s%> and <S%H3789>subscribe<s%> the <S%H5612>deeds,<s%> and <S%H2856>seal<s%> <S%H5749>them,<s%> and call <S%H5707>witnesses,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin,<s%> and in the places <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the hill <S%H2022>country,<s%> and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H8219>lowland,<s%> and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5045>South:<s%> for I will cause their <S%H7622>captivity<s%> to <S%H7725>return,<s%> <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
